list-item.p: Phospho-specific flow cytometry was used to asses anti-HSV-1 antiviral drug combinations.
HSV-1 replication induces phosphorylation of S6 ribosomal protein.
Ribavirin blocked HSV-1-induced phosphorylation of S6 ribosomal protein while blocking HSV-1 replication.
S6 kinase inhibitor blocks HSV-1 replication in vitro and an in vivo animal model of HSV-1 infection.
